name: maille-org-api
description: |Method|Path|Description| |------|----|-----------| |GET|/weave|Fetch all weaves| |GET|/weave/:id|Fetch a weave with id=xxx| |POST|/weave|Create a new weave| |PUT|/weave/:id|Update a weave with id=xxx| |DELETE|/weave/:id|Delete a weave with id=xxx|
author: Eric Nielsen
